text:
@SpeakerPelosi @DJohnsonNCC1031 Unbelievable DPA isn't in full force, 3 months after new coronavirus was announced to WTO,  2 months after China itself asked for & received our PPE (18 tons airlifted), and when China was completely shut down for many weeks.  

Where are the contingency plans? Secret? Ignored?
